transcript: a guy got on and he said hey I think I've tapped my market well what are you doing in sales he's like well I'm doing 2 million a year and what industry you go after he said chiropractors I said okay you think that the $40,000 a month that you spend on Facebook ads has tapped the 10 billion doll industry of chiropractors well you say it like that not really how many other caropractor agencies are there 100 500 a th000 and all of them still get customers every day so why can't I go get all of the customers that all of those people are getting why not because we're not doing the things that those people are doing to advertise to get them
